# saveOptions

**Instance Property**

Returns a constant indicating how to deal with closing any modified documents.

## Declaration

```swift
var saveOptions: NSSaveOptions { get }
```

## Return Value

A constant indicating how to deal with closing any modified documents. The default value returned is `NSSaveOptionsAsk`. See “Constants” in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCloseCommand] for a list of possible return values.

## Related Documentation

- **Cocoa Scripting Guide**
